tweet: Thank u all for ur prayers and concern. I believe we're gonna be alright :)
The tests ruled out the flu and RSV so that's good.
We'll be @ the hospital til tomorrow. They're monitoring bradley...his fever finally broke but we have to get another chest xray in the morn
At Memorial...they just took my baby away from me to take blood and take some tests...he's sick...be praying. We'll be here til tomorrow
On our way home from Houma, LA...can't wait to see my mama tomorrow and spend some time with her hearing all about her Nepal trip
